skills.name: OWL'S CLAW
desc: • Deals magic damage to a single target.
• 25% Chance to inflict Flame on the target for 1 turn.

skills.name: BLAZING SPIRIT
desc: • Increase MAGIC and MR of all allies for 1 turn.

skills.name: BURNT OFFERING
desc: Transform Golden Effects on a random enemy, excluding Shroud, Ghost, Soul Protect, and Perfect Immortality, into Magic Burns for 2 turns at the start of battle.
